text: Juichi Nagatani (born 27 January 1903 – 2 February 1953Asahi Shimbun 3 February 1953 p. 7) was a Japanese long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Japanese male long-distance runners Category:Japanese male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Place of birth missing
title: Juichi Nagatani
